St. Vital Centre

St. Vital Centre, south entrance, next to Cineplex SilverCity

204-809-3604 Get Directions

Your South Winnipeg Dental Home

Conveniently located at St. Vital Centre, our south Winnipeg location has been serving families in St. Vital, St. Norbert, Fort Richmond, and surrounding communities for over 20 years. With easy access from Bishop Grandin and St. Mary's Road, we're your neighborhood dental care provider.

Extended Hours for Your Convenience

We understand busy schedules. That's why we offer early morning appointments starting at 7:00 AM and evening hours until 9:00 PM Monday through Thursday, plus Saturday availability.

Meet Our St. Vital Team

Dr. Patrick McManus

Owner & Lead Dentist

University of Manitoba graduate and part-time clinical instructor. With over 25 years of experience, Dr. McManus leads our St. Vital team with patient-focused care.

Dr. Jodie Heinrich

General Dentist

Born and raised in Winnipeg, University of Manitoba graduate. Dr. Heinrich brings a warm, caring approach to family and cosmetic dentistry.

Dr. Christopher Bao

General Dentist

University of Manitoba graduate and part-time clinical instructor. Dr. Bao combines the latest techniques with a gentle touch for comfortable care.

Dr. Reem Atout

General Dentist

Known for her excellent work with anxious patients, Dr. Atout creates a calm, reassuring environment for all.

Services Available at This Location

  • Emergency Dental Care
  • CEREC Same-Day Crowns
  • Invisalign® Treatment
  • Dental Implants
  • Root Canal Therapy
  • Zoom! Whitening
  • Lumineers & Veneers
  • Crowns & Bridges
  • Pediatric Dentistry
  • Ultrasonic Scaling

Why Choose Our St. Vital Location?

  • • Convenient Location: Located at St. Vital Centre with ample free parking
  • • Extended Hours: Early morning and evening appointments available
  • • Experienced Team: Over 20 years serving the South Winnipeg community
  • • Complete Services: From routine cleanings to advanced procedures
  • • Direct Billing: We work with all major insurance providers

Office Hours

Walk-ins Welcome! We accommodate emergency appointments whenever possible.

Book Appointment

Find Us Here

Parking

Free parking is available throughout St. Vital Centre. Enter through the south entrance for closest access to our office (Suite 110). Handicap accessible parking spots are available near all entrances.

Public Transit

Easily accessible by Winnipeg Transit. Routes 16, 75, and 162 all stop at St. Vital Centre. The nearest stop is located at the south entrance, just steps from our office.
